title: Star Guardian Landing Page 404 Error
body:
Getting a 404 error on the new 2017 Start Guardian Landing Page. 

Figured you'd want to know. 

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/star-guardian-2017

replies.body:
Hey! 

Thanks for the report! Everything *should* be fixed now, but lemme know if you're still having issues. :)

I have had similar bug report over on EUNE.
https://boards.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-reports-eu/uH3EPZEM-new-loot-lancer-zero-hecarim

That was almost a month ago, and still isn't fixed (and is pretty much too late now). :(

There is also a page in Polish over on the English section.

>The Star Guardian collection

http://eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/news?page=1

I get that there are different Reds on the different servers, but even these small things does make EUNE feel like left out in the cold.
